
set(GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER "glm")
file(GLOB ROOT_SOURCE ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/*.cpp)
file(GLOB ROOT_INLINE ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/*.inl)
file(GLOB ROOT_HEADER ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/*.hpp)
file(GLOB ROOT_TEXT ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/../*.txt)
file(GLOB ROOT_MD ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/../*.md)
file(GLOB ROOT_NAT ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/../util/glm.natvis)

file(GLOB CORE_SOURCE ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/detail/*.cpp)
file(GLOB CORE_INLINE ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/detail/*.inl)
file(GLOB CORE_HEADER ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/detail/*.hpp)

file(GLOB EXT_SOURCE ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/ext/*.cpp)
file(GLOB EXT_INLINE ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/ext/*.inl)
file(GLOB EXT_HEADER ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/ext/*.hpp)

file(GLOB GTC_SOURCE ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/gtc/*.cpp)
file(GLOB GTC_INLINE ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/gtc/*.inl)
file(GLOB GTC_HEADER ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/gtc/*.hpp)

file(GLOB GTX_SOURCE ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/gtx/*.cpp)
file(GLOB GTX_INLINE ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/gtx/*.inl)
file(GLOB GTX_HEADER ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/gtx/*.hpp)

file(GLOB SIMD_SOURCE ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/simd/*.cpp)
file(GLOB SIMD_INLINE ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/simd/*.inl)
file(GLOB SIMD_HEADER ${GLM_SOURCE_FOLDER}/simd/*.h)

add_library(glm STATIC 
	${ROOT_TEXT} 	  ${ROOT_MD} 		${ROOT_NAT}
	${ROOT_SOURCE}    ${ROOT_INLINE}    ${ROOT_HEADER}
	${CORE_SOURCE}    ${CORE_INLINE}    ${CORE_HEADER}
	${EXT_SOURCE}     ${EXT_INLINE}     ${EXT_HEADER}
	${GTC_SOURCE}     ${GTC_INLINE}     ${GTC_HEADER}
	${GTX_SOURCE}     ${GTX_INLINE}     ${GTX_HEADER}
	${SIMD_SOURCE}    ${SIMD_INLINE}    ${SIMD_HEADER}
	)

target_include_directories(
	glm INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
)
